title: champ select rune page editing
body:
before the latest patch, if you had a rune page filled in you could click the paths you wanted to go (eg inspiration and sorcery) and then it would be refreshed and none of the keystones/minor runes selected.

now u have to switch to another (eg resolve) and switch back.

please revert this.

replies.body: Sounds like its an issue on your end
